switcher.author: Intel Corporation
switcher.description: Forward blob packets on to output port set by index.

in_ports.description: Where to receive the blob packet to be forwarded.
in_ports.name: IN

in_ports.description: Index of input port to be used to forward input packet.
in_ports.name: IN_PORT

in_ports.description: Index of output port to be used to forward input packet.
in_ports.name: OUT_PORT

switcher.name: switcher/blob

members.description: Initial input port index used to forward packets. Value must be greater or equal to 0 and less than 256.
members.name: in_port

members.description: Initial output port index used to forward packets. Value must be greater or equal to 0 and less than 256.
members.name: out_port

members.description: When enabled last packet received on each input port will be saved, so when index are changed, it'll send last received value, instead of only forward the next packet. If no packet was received at certain index, no packet will be sent.
members.name: keep_state

switcher.author: Intel Corporation
switcher.description: Forward empty packets on to output port set by index.

in_ports.description: Where to receive the packet to be forwarded. Any packet can be received, but they'll be forwarded as empty packets.
in_ports.name: IN

in_ports.description: Index of input port to be used to forward input packet.
in_ports.name: IN_PORT

in_ports.description: Index of output port to be used to forward input packet.
in_ports.name: OUT_PORT

members.description: Initial input port index used to forward packets. Value must be greater or equal to 0 and less than 256.
members.name: in_port

members.name: out_port

members.description: When enabled last packet received on each input port will be saved, so when index are changed, it'll send last received value, instead of only forward the next packet. If no packet was received at certain index, no packet will be sent.
members.name: keep_state

in_ports.description: Where to receive the error packet to be forwarded. They're forwared via 'ERROR' port.
in_ports.name: IN
